description:
“Hello! I'm Ralph, and my parents have just gone out for dinner. Unfortunately, I seem to have misplaced all my toys, including my beloved little blue ball. Would you be able to assist me in finding them?”

Embark on a very charming hidden object short game based on a true story.

FEATURES:
♥ 13 Toys for you to find
♥ 8 hand crafted levels
♥ Gallery with all the levels.
♥ Unique and Charming pixel art style.
name: Ralph and the Blue Ball
intro: Ralph needs your help to find all his toys especially his lovely little blue ball. Embark on a very charming hidden object game based on a true story.
